channel.title: Say Nothing on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Say Nothing on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Disney Sued for Defamation Over FX Series ‘Say Nothing’
item.description: Former Provisional Irish Republican Army volunteer Marian Price is calling for damages and for a pivotal sequence to be removed from the Emmy-nominated series’ final episode.
